conclusion: Violation of Art. 11;Violation of Art. 13+11;Violation of Art. 14+11;Non-pecuniary damage - award
externalsources: Recommendation CM/Rec(2101)5 of the Committee of Ministers of the Council of Europe on measures to combat discrimination on grounds of sexual orientation or  gender identity
judges: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;Elisabeth Steiner;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
